entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StreamWriter constructor documentation mismatch with implementation #106237
  • StreamReader constructor documentation mismatch with implementation #106236
  • Implement IsNullOrWhitespace using SearchValues #106235
  • net8.0-ios / net8.0-android: mtouchi18n / mandroidi18n options do not apply? #106232
    Future

Closed

  • Multiplication with 8 not optimized to left-shift? #106239
  • QUIC fails to work after upgrading libmsquic to latest version #105788
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] HardwareIntrinsics\X64Avx512 test fails on machines with no avx512 (on Windows only) #87931
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement BinaryReader.ReadExactly #106238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • docs: fix a typo #106234
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Fix handling of compare when last instruction in bblock #106233
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Merged

  • Only run AVX512 tests on CPUs that support it (Windows) #106161
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Shuffle MethodTable flags #106182
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix infinite loop in foregroundgc test #106006
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [mono] Test llvm bump #105867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add `DebuggerHidden` to managed JitHelpers #106167
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Small tunning for write-barrier on arm64 #106191
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: limit phi-refinement to loop-invariant VNs #106229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2513070 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] make sure that MonoBundledResource.id is valid #106205
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Added all missing xml docs for Tensors #106084
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix native libs selection in System.IO.Ports package #106231
    area-System.IO
  • Add `JsonElement.GetPropertyCount()` #106222
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • fix #105969 #106218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Post-merge tasks #2472

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to August 11 #2653
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix EH with table-disjoint mutually protecting handlers #2652

Merged

    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • False positive NU5017 #42660
  • How can you test multiple netstandard targets? #1561
    Discussion

Updated

  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • error NU1903: Warning As Error: Package 'System.Private.Uri' 4.3.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xhfc-gr8f-ffwc #42651

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update the version of System.Formats.Asn1 #42278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update the version of System.Formats.Asn1 #42277
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

Updated

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • IDE0060 (unused parameter) shouldn't report unused InterpolatedStringHandler parameters #58168
    Backlog

Updated

  • Do not include folder name to namespace #45494
    Backlog
  • Fix formatting not using tabs #74702
  • Visual Studio does not reload source generator assemblies when they change on disk #48083
    Backlog
  • Intellisense does not work after updating to 17.10.0 Preview 3.0 #73023

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor semantic snippets #74712
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plaintext #57275
  • [Blazor] rendermode="InteractiveAuto" cleared injection of AuthenticationStateProvider #57274
  • Deprecated API usage #57273
  • Add a Description property to the ProducesResponseTypeAttribute<T> #57272
  • Perf regression: caching, plaintext #57271
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57270

Closed

  • CascadingValueSource crashes because subscriber are added asynchronously #56741
    9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor WASM] Upgrading project to .NET 8 and breaks [Authorize] Attribute #53075
    9.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #57268
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #57262
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #57266

PullRequests

Created

  • Additional logging for EventCountersAndMetricsValues #57269
    area-hosting

Merged

  • [Blazor] Allow cascading value subscribers to get added and removed during change notification #57243
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Add option to specify custom OpenAPI output file name like Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Cli #56974
    area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Add support for Chromium Snap cert trust #57257
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, 8.0.x
  • Add some comments to various internal HTTP/2 types #57151
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Quarantine Hosting VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues and EventCountersAndMetricsValues tests #57260
    area-hosting

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-11

Issues

Closed

  • Captured memory dump of MSIX packaged app, doesn't contain threads and call stack information #4833

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't control on view height when soft keyboard appears because it covers typing message #24145
  • App crash after invoked FilePicker.Default.PickAsync in administrator mode and release mode of the Unpackaged app #24141
  • Nullable Enums do not bind in XAML #24139
    Backlog

Closed

  • Entry ReturnType.Next does not render on Android when application is launched, but does if changed via hot reload #24144
  • Memory leak when Windows multiple window get closed #24140

PullRequests

Created

  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows] Allow setting `PlatformCanvas.Antialias` #23965
    community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Android] App crash when text exceeds Entry MaxLength #24138
    community ✨
  • Remove MAUI styling from Blazor Hybrid Solution template #24136
    area-templates
  • Remove MAUI styling from Blazor Hybrid template #24135
    area-templates

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPH breaks when discrimiantor has the same name as ignored property. #34404
  • Cosmos vector distance queries for arrays throw #34402
    9.0.0
  • Improve creation of RelationalCommandCache expression in RelationalShapedQueryCompilingExpressionVisitor #34400
    Backlog
  • Consider lifting up correlated scalar subqueries to JOINs where possible, for better query performance #34398
    Backlog

Closed

  • Reimplement EF.Constant without introducing constant nodes in the funcletizer #33674
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected behaviour with AsNoTracking() and projection (Select) #34397

PullRequests

Created

  • API review updates: #34403
  • Experimental support for the Azure SQL JSON type #34401

Merged

  • Variable rename from #34385. #34399
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297

Updated

  • Support vector search on Cosmos DB #33991
